relevant_findings.general: Awake, appeared in distress, moaning, reported abdominal pain.
relevant_findings.neurological: Strength in the right arm decreased, unsteady gait, alternated between somnolent and agitated, did not make eye contact or respond to questions, purposeful limb movements in response to stimuli.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Numbness extended to the left side; increasing confusion and agitation developed over time.
